actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to insure that foreign articles of clothing are not exempt from the country of origin making requirements of the Tariff Act of 1930 by reason of certain processing after importation.

summary.text: Stipulates that foreign articles of clothing are not exempt from the country of origin marking requirements of the Tariff Act of 1930 by reasons of certain processing after importation.

titles.title: A bill to insure that foreign articles of clothing are not exempt from the country of origin making requirements of the Tariff Act of 1930 by reason of certain processing after importation.
